Press & Media

Jimmy Lee Shreeve’s writing has appeared in:

  • The Independent
  • The Daily Telegraph
  • The Sunday Telegraph
  • The Financial Times
  • The Daily Express

He has been interviewed on radio, podcasts, and television in connection with his books and cultural commentary.

Selected titles:

  • Blood Rites — Random House
  • Doktor Snake’s Voodoo Spellbook — St. Martin’s Press

Media enquiries can be directed via the Contact page.

About

Doktor Snake is the working identity of Jimmy Lee Shreeve — author and former journalist published in The Independent, Daily Telegraph, Sunday Telegraph, and Financial Times.
